About Us

about

Who we are?

DAY TO DAY have established themselves as one of the well-known brands throughout the United Arab Emirates

Since 1998, we have worked to deliver the best possible shopping experience to our customers both within the U.A.E and to our international tourists and helped them to get the best value for every single dirham spent in our stores. We have been regarded as a leading discount center offering a wide range of products that cater to the different needs spread across various age groups for the whole family. We are also committed to serving our loyal customers by offering them the best customer service that each of them can experience.

We are the first and still considered the No. 1 customer-oriented service provider, giving our loyal customers a memorable experience when shopping at our various branches.

What do we offer?

We offer a variety of products that cater to the needs of every age segment from toddlers to adults.

We also have under our roof some of the leading brand's products available in our stores. We have dedicated sections/floors for fashion (Men’s / Women’s / Kids wear), Fashion Accessories, Cosmetics, shoes, Household items, electronic appliances, food items, dairy products stationery, and many more. Our customer service helps to cater to the needs and requests of our loyal customers who have repeatedly returned to our stores time after time.

Our Strategy.

We are one of the biggest stores in the U.A.E, which has all the items that you would need for your daily use. We also have various combo packs and requests from loyal customers who have repeatedly returned to our stores. Our promotions are well known and most sought after giving our customers value for each dirham spent in our stores.

Our marketing team comprises professional, young, dynamic persons who bring out their creative talents with brochures and flyers that enable us to increase the footfall in our stores. Our in-house social media team also helps to reach out to the residents of Dubai and Northern Emirates through various social media platforms for our ongoing campaigns and promotions. We also run social media live when we offer special promotions in our stores that are real crowd-pullers, especially during the weekends and festive seasons.

Our Presence and Footprint

One of the oldest discount stores in Dubai, DAY TO DAY has grown since 1998 and now has 15 branches spread across the Emirate of Dubai and Northern Emirates of Sharjah and Ajman (U.A.E.)

Our store's presence can be felt in prominent locations like Karama, Al Barsha, Union, Opposite Deira City Center (DCC), AL Nahda 1, Abu Shagara (Sharjah), and Ajman to name a few. Our branches are located at key strategic points where we offer unbeatable deals and amazing discounts that make them attractive and accessible for our customers to buy. Post-pandemic we have entered the shopping mall concept where we give our valued customers the best shopping experience ever. Our newly opened branches like Karama Mall (Dubai), Sharjah Mall (Al Qasimi, Sharjah), and Ajman Mall (Ajman) have all ensured that we have all the shopping requirements of our dear customers covered from A to Z.

Our Vision & Our Mission

DAY TO DAY vision is “We are here to fulfill your needs.” Our Mission is to provide quality products at reasonable and affordable prices that extend over a wide range of product lines and offerings. From our humble beginning, we continue to give our customers the best product and brand in our stores at discounted prices. Products and brands that we have used over the years which our customers continue to test us to provide with the latest trends, technology, and products at very competitive price

As we have witnessed a change in customer spending habits post-pandemic, our loyal customers have noted that the need to open more department stores is urgent. Hence, we plan to expand our operations within the U.A.E. and across the GCC.
